titleStmt.title: Reasons for raising the price of tin at the present, and keeping it from falling for the future, in the counties of Cornwall and Devon together with some proposals in order to effect the same without any offence to our neighbours, or prejudice to the traders in that commodity.

Reasons for raising the price of tin at the present, and keeping it from falling for the future, in the counties of Cornwall and Devon together with some proposals in order to effect the same without any offence to our neighbours, or prejudice to the traders in that commodity.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
